FuncDef: This command enables the context to create an application assurance group with the specified system-unique index and enables the context to configure that group s parameters.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer to identify the AA group. Values-1 to 255.
Mandatory keyword used when creating an application assurance group in the ISA context. The create keyword requirement can be enabled/disabled in the environment>create context.

Specifies the set of scaling limits that are supported with regards to the maximum number of AA subscribers per ISA and the corresponding policies that can be specified. ParamDefault: Default- residential
